member.summary: Add a health check for Kafka cluster.
member.param: The .
The Kafka connection configuration parameters to be used.
The topic name to produce Kafka messages on.
The health check name. Optional. If null the type name 'kafka' will be used for the name.
The that should be reported when the health check fails. Optional. If null then the default status of will be reported.
A list of tags that can be used to filter sets of health checks. Optional.
An optional representing the timeout of the check.
